hero.subtitle: Reliable airport transfers from Bishkek to anywhere in Kyrgyzstan

booking.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll contact you within 5 minutes

booking.success: Booking submitted! We'll contact you shortly.

routes.title: Routes & Prices
routes.subtitle: Fixed prices for transfers from Manas Airport

flights.title: Flight Tracking

tours.title: Tours in Kyrgyzstan
tours.subtitle: Discover the beauty of Kyrgyzstan with our tours

issykKul.title: Issyk-Kul Lake Tour
issykKul.description: Unforgettable journey to Issyk-Kul Lake — the pearl of Central Asia. Visit Cholpon-Ata, Karakol and the southern shore. Beach relaxation and mountain scenery.

sonKul.title: Son-Kul Lake Tour
sonKul.description: Journey to the alpine lake Son-Kul at 3,016m altitude. Stay in a yurt, horse riding, experience nomadic culture.

alaArcha.title: Ala-Archa — A Day in the Mountains
alaArcha.description: Day trip to Ala-Archa National Park. Mountain trails, waterfalls, glaciers and stunning Tien Shan views.

silkRoad.title: Great Silk Road Journey
silkRoad.description: 7-day journey along the ancient Silk Road through Kyrgyzstan. Tash-Rabat, Naryn, Son-Kul, mountain passes and caravanserais.

osh.title: Osh & Southern Kyrgyzstan
osh.description: Journey to the ancient city of Osh — the second capital of Kyrgyzstan. Sulaiman-Too, bazaar, Uzgen and walnut forests of Arslanbob.

horseTrek.title: Mountain Horse Trek
horseTrek.description: 5-day horse trek through Kyrgyz mountain pastures. Jailoo camps, yurt stays, alpine lakes and shepherd encounters.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Full range of services for a comfortable journey

airportTransfer.title: Airport Transfer
airportTransfer.description: Comfortable transfer from Manas Airport to anywhere in Kyrgyzstan. Meet at arrival zone, luggage assistance.

meetGreet.title: Meet & Greet
meetGreet.description: Our driver will meet you at the arrival zone with a name sign. Help with luggage and escort to the vehicle.

vipTransfer.title: VIP Transfer
vipTransfer.description: Premium transfer in a business-class vehicle. Leather interior, AC, Wi-Fi, water and snacks.

hotelBooking.title: Hotel Booking
hotelBooking.description: We'll help book the best hotels and guesthouses in Bishkek and across Kyrgyzstan at special prices.

cityTour.title: City Tour
cityTour.description: Sightseeing tour of Bishkek with an experienced driver. Ala-Too Square, bazaars, museums and other landmarks.

businessTransfer.title: Business Transfer
businessTransfer.description: Transfer for business trips. Punctuality, confidentiality, comfortable business-class vehicle.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: We make your journey comfortable from the very first minute

fixedPrices.title: Fixed Prices
fixedPrices.description: No surprises — you know the price upfront. No meters or surcharges.

professional.title: Professional Drivers
professional.description: Experienced drivers who know all routes. Polite, punctual, with 5+ years of experience.

flightTracking.title: Flight Tracking
flightTracking.description: We monitor your flight and adjust for delays. Your driver is always on time.

available247.title: Available 24/7
available247.description: We're always on call. Early morning flight or late night arrival — we're always there.

comfortable.title: Comfortable Vehicles
comfortable.description: Clean, air-conditioned vehicles. Sedans and minivans for any number of passengers.

languages.title: Multilingual Support
languages.description: Service in Russian, Kyrgyz, English and other languages. For every guest.

footer.description: Official Manas Airport taxi service. Reliable transfers across Kyrgyzstan.
